connect_handshake.label: connect+handshake (VSock + Nitro attestation)
connect_handshake.description: Full VSock connect + 3-message handshake with real Nitro attestation (NSM call + COSE_Sign1 verification)

transport_rtt.label: transport RTT (64B echo, encrypted channel)
transport_rtt.description: Round-trip of 64-byte ECHO payload over established encrypted SecureChannel via VSock. Measures: encrypt + frame + VSock write + server read + deframe + echo + frame + VSock write + client read + deframe + decrypt

inference_rtt.label: inference RTT (MiniLM-L6-v2, 384-dim F32)
inference_rtt.description: Round-trip of text payload → model inference → 384-dim F32 tensor response over established encrypted SecureChannel via VSock

notes: DEBUG_MODE: Enclave runs in debug mode which allows console access. PCR values differ from production mode (PCR0 is zeroed in debug). Not representative of production security posture.
Sample sizes: handshake n=50, transport RTT n=200, inference n=50. Sufficient for stable p50/p95; p99 is coarse at n=50.
All measurements include full protocol overhead (encryption, framing, VSock I/O). No synthetic exclusions.
Inference-only estimate is derived (inference RTT - transport RTT), not directly measured inside the enclave.
